parameter.name: page
parameter.description: Index of the page to return when the responses are paginated.

parameter.name: perPage
parameter.description: No. of entries to return in a page when responses are paginated.

parameter.name: sort
parameter.description: Name of the property by which the responses will be sorted.

parameter.name: order
parameter.description: Ascending or descending order in which the responses will be sorted.

parameter.name: practitionerId
parameter.description: ID of the practitioner (practitioner-specific) whose invoices would be retrieved.

parameter.name: patientId
parameter.description: ID of the patient (patient-specific) whose invoices would be retrieved.

parameter.name: appointmentId
parameter.description: ID of the appointment (appointment-specific) whose invoices would be retrieved.

parameter.name: query
parameter.description: Query to filter the response entries.

parameter.name: deleted
parameter.description: Indicate whether to retrieve only the deleted invoices or not.
